00012 #ifndef __included_cc_stopwatch_h
00013 #define __included_cc_stopwatch_h
00014 
00015 #ifndef __GNUC__
00016 #include <crisscross/universal_include.h>
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 #if defined ( TARGET_OS_MACOSX )
00020 #   include <mach/mach.h>
00021 #   include <mach/mach_time.h>
00022 #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_LINUX )
00023 #   include <sys/time.h>
00024 #   include <time.h>
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 namespace CrissCross
00028 {
00029     namespace System
00030     {
00032         class Stopwatch
00033         {
00034         protected:
00035 #if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00036             LARGE_INTEGER               m_start, m_finish;
00037             double                      m_tickInterval;
00038 #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_MACOSX )
00039             uint64_t                    m_start;
00040             uint64_t                    m_finish;
00041             mach_timebase_info_data_t     m_timebase;
00042 #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_LINUX ) || defined ( TARGET_OS_FREEBSD ) || defined ( TARGET_OS_NETBSD ) || defined ( TARGET_OS_OPENBSD )
00043             struct timeval              m_start;
00044             struct timeval              m_finish;
00045 #else
00046 #error No target OS defined (did you forget to include crisscross/universal_include.h?)
00047 #endif
00048         public:
00050             Stopwatch();
00051 
00053             ~Stopwatch();
00054 
00056             inline void Start()
00057             {
00058             #if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00059                 QueryPerformanceCounter ( &m_start );
00060             #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_MACOSX )
00061                 m_start = mach_absolute_time ();
00062             #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_LINUX )
00063                 gettimeofday ( &m_start, NULL );
00064             #endif
00065             };
00066 
00068             inline void Stop()
00069             {
00070             #if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00071                 QueryPerformanceCounter ( &m_finish );
00072             #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_MACOSX )
00073                 m_finish = mach_absolute_time ();
00074             #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_LINUX )
00075                 gettimeofday ( &m_finish, NULL );
00076             #endif
00077             };
00078 
00080 
00083             double Elapsed();
00084         };
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 #endif
